Introduction
This topic contains information on restricted records storage and control, including
restricted record and sensitive access designations
restricted access claims centers (RACC) locations, jurisdiction, and addresses
handling paper claims folders containing restricted information
redacting copies of documents containing personally identifiable information (PII) for multiple individuals prior to providing copies to the claimant or a third party, and
redacting documents containing criminal investigation reports.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Restricted Records Storage and Control
citation: Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
